titleStmt.title: London tryacle being the enemie to all infectious diseases; as may appear by the discourse following.
titleStmt.author: Band, R. fl. 1612
Besse, William.
Browne, R.

notesStmt.note: Describes a medicine sold by William Besse.
Editor's dedication signed: R. Band. In the 1615 edition the same dedication is signed "R. Browne".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
